0.text: Bug 113055  Dynamic image review button is expected to be disabeld if no image appears when click on it.

1.text: description: Dynamic image review button is expected to be disabeld if no image appears  when click on it   steps to reproduce: 1. drag and image to layout view 2. select dynamic image radio box 3. click on binding to bind the image to a image data set column 4. click on Preview button  actual result: no image appears when click on Preview button.

2.text: expected result: if binary image from database can't be previewed in image builder, then  disable the preview button.

3.text: Or when click on preview button, image in data base should show up
